/* ProdBatchChangeMapper.getProdBatchChangeList */
SELECT thp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM, FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PATH_NM, thpb.BARCD_CD, thp.SALE_PROD_YN, thp.POINT_SAVE_YN, thp.PRC_CTRL_FG
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS thpc, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD thpb WHERE 1=1 AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{prodCd} ||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{prodNm} ||'%'
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND thpb.BARCD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{barCd} ||'%'
AND thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD = thp.PROD_CLASS_CD AND thpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpb.PROD_CD (+)= thp.PROD_CD ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD
SELECT tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PATH_NM, tmpb.BARCD_CD, tmp.SALE_PROD_YN, tmp.POINT_SAVE_YN, tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG, tmp.REG_FG
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS tmpc, TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD tmpb WHERE 1=1 AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{prodCd} ||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{prodNm} ||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND tmpb.BARCD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{barCd} ||'%'
AND tmpc.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpc.PROD_CLASS_CD = tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD AND tmpb.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpb.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD
